channel.title: Hi guys, im back
channel.description:
hi guys, i havent been on here for ages, maybe over a year because i quit runescape because it screwed up my modem, pissed me off and was gay. after a while i got bored with nothing to do and remembered how much i wanted to hack runescape or something.
so i decided yeah that should be a good challenge and came back here...
i am learning delphi scripting language now and decided if the java client connects with the server so can executables. first off the guys who got the server code to make public servers, can i see it please!!! so i can look for things to exploit, like the loggin thing to get passwords. not that id use that, i only mean for, erm, autoing and stuff

item.title: Hi guys, im back
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Nice to see you on, jme. And nice to see you beating down idiots. Much <3.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys, im back
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“boberick, post:5, topic:111850”]when did i say anything about scamming? oh yeah by the way thanks for leting me know that sum1 wrote the server code, oh well we can still use javascript and sql injections, well sql if we wanted to change our own pasword if we forgot it, it could be used on other peoples, but thats scamming and its not allowed on the forums so ill stop talking about that.

also javascript injections could get whoevers password you wanted, or everyones off the leaderboard, possibly spawn items in your inventory but that would be alot harder…
who says i get some people who can do javascript injections to hack the name and passwords???[/quote]

That’s not gonna work buddy, just quit while you are ahead. Infact, there’s almost no logic behind anything you just said.

I swear you did a couple of levels on hackthissite.org and now you think your some amazing hacker.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys, im back
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_Olan14 I Am Olan14
item.description:
@I_Am_Olan14 wrote:

How the heck can you get peoples passwords with JavaScript Injection?
How the heck can you even USE JavaScript to get anything through runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys, im back

item.description:

boberick:

wanted to change our own pasword if we forgot it

l2recoveryquestions

boberick:

also javascript injections could get whoevers password you wanted

Get some logic please.

item.title: Hi guys, im back
item.dc:creator: @boberick boberick
item.description:
@boberick wrote:

when did i say anything about scamming? oh yeah by the way thanks for leting me know that sum1 wrote the server code, oh well we can still use javascript and sql injections, well sql if we wanted to change our own pasword if we forgot it, it could be used on other peoples, but thats scamming and its not allowed on the forums so ill stop talking about that.

also javascript injections could get whoevers password you wanted, or everyones off the leaderboard, possibly spawn items in your inventory but that would be alot harder…
who says i get some people who can do javascript injections to hack the name and passwords???

Read full topic

item.title: Hi guys, im back

item.description:

[quote=“boberick, post:1, topic:111850”]hi guys, i havent been on here for ages, maybe over a year because i quit runescape because it screwed up my modem, pissed me off and was gay.
after a while i got bored with nothing to do and remembered how much i wanted to hack runescape or something.

so i decided yeah that should be a good challenge and came back here…

i am learning delphi scripting language now and decided if the java client connects with the server so can executables.
first off the guys who got the server code to make public servers, can i see it please!!! so i can look for things to exploit, like the loggin thing to get passwords.
not that id use that, i only mean for, erm, autoing and stuff[/quote]Scamming is against the rules, and the “Server Code” is not runescapes actual server code, it was just something someone wrote.

item.title: Hi guys, im back
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I think most of that post was relating to moparscape questions.
Go over to www.moparisthebest.com for client stuff like that… but yeah just incase you didn’t know thats where the private server stuff is.

Anyways welcome back and sorry if the above is not related.

Read full topic
